name: Degen Royale
description: Degen Royale is the first P2S (Play to Socialize) community. Everything happens on tropical degen islands. Degen Royale includes a 1st person shooter royale rumble, and loads of content to socialize with (3D dance vids, memes, AR filters etc). Come to the islands as your own PFP. The NFT collection are gadgets and weapons giving you access to the islands. Dance, socialize, rumble and battle - your own pfp comes alive and a whole new world of web3 entertainment awaits you.
